attributes.action: MotherCare should Change the name so it's suitable for both parents and carers
attributes.background: MOTHERCARE ,, this is discrimantion to all fathers and male carers and even grandads and uncles cousin etc etc .. i can't even enter the shop with out the getting opinionated as I'm a male a father a role model to my children but as it's called mothercare not FATHERCARE i feel inadequate and useless

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Mothercare is a private company and the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for their decisions.

You may wish to contact them directly about this issue.
